sentences.en: Already , middle - class shoppers crowd into Carrefour, Wal - Mart and Ikea.
sentences.cn: 中产阶级购物者已蜂拥进家乐福, 沃尔玛 和依高.

sentences.en: But Wal - Mart rejected the report as untrue and unsubstantiated.
sentences.cn: 但是, 沃尔玛 驳斥这项报告是不真实,缺乏事实依据.

sentences.en: Drive over to Wal - Mart a gallon of milk and you may end up on PeopleofWalmart. com.
sentences.cn: 开车去沃尔玛(Wal-Mart)买盒牛奶,你的照片就可能被登在网上.

sentences.en: He seemed to walk in the direction of Wu Mart.
sentences.cn: 他好像是朝物美商城的方向走的.

sentences.en: If the top 20, has long been to a Wal - Mart !
sentences.cn: 如果跻身前20, 沃尔马 早就来了!

sentences.en: It does not want to abandon its poor to the streets and its shopkeepers to Wal - Mart.
sentences.cn: 它不想弃穷人于街道,丢店主于 沃尔玛 (Wal-Mart)之类的市场.

sentences.en: Kaufland, Lidl's sister operation , was in direct competition with Wal - Mart's hyper markets.
sentences.cn: Lidl 联合经营的Kaufland就是与 沃尔玛 超市直接竞争的.

sentences.en: Maybe we should just let Wal - Mart handle Pentagon procurement.
sentences.cn: 也许我们应该让沃而玛来负责五角大楼的采购呢.

sentences.en: New York is a great mart of the world.
sentences.cn: 纽约是世界的大商业中心.

sentences.en: Registering to join Wal Mart's Hubster community also requires parental consent.
sentences.cn: 注册参加沃尔玛的社区也要求获得父母同意.

sentences.en: So , Maxi - Mart really makes you wear those things, huh, bro?
sentences.cn: 麦克斯马特真的让你带上那个, 嗯, 老兄?

sentences.en: So are big employers like General Motors and Wal - Mart.
sentences.cn: 通用汽车和 沃尔玛 这样的大型用人单位也是如此.

sentences.en: the largest furniture mart in the region
sentences.cn: 该地区最大的家具市场

sentences.en: To promote sales, Wal - Mart is selling GeGeDa brand eggs for half off!
sentences.cn: 作为促销, 沃尔玛 正在半价销售咯咯哒品牌鸡蛋!

sentences.en: Wal - Mart wasn't just selling barbecues and board games. It was selling experiences.
sentences.cn: 所以说,除了卖烤肉架和棋盘游戏外, 沃尔玛 还卖体验.

trans.tran_en: a place where goods are sold – used especially in the names of shops
